DjangoPyPI 2
============
DjangoPyPI is a `Django <https://www.djangoproject.com/>`_ application that provides a re-implementation of the `Python Package Index <http://pypi.python.org>`_.
Using Twitter Bootstrap for UI, forked from the original DjangoPyPi project, DjangoPyPi2 provides an easy to use and manage interface.
